<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1992|הֵם]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִמּוֺ‎</span><sub>9</sub> (Ezra), <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִמּוֺן‎</span><sub>3</sub> (Daniel), **pronoun 3 plural** ==they, them== (= Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵם‎</span>,  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵמָּה‎</span>, q. v., but the more original forms. Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎המו‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>145 B 4</sup> ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>207</sup>),<sup>149 A 1</sup>, [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. C 7, 10</sup> +; not [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac, which use <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִנּוּן‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, instead; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">. The ***n*** in <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִמּוֺן‎</span>, as in <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דֵּין‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִלֵּין‎</span>, by the side of <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֵלֶּה‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 86</sup> [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 106</sup>); — ***they, them:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** as nominative [[Ezra.5.11|Ezra 5:11]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲבַחְנָא הִמּוֺ עַבְדוֺהִי‎</span> ***we are*** his servants (construction as in Syriac, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>§ 312</sup> [[BDB#D|D]] [[Matt.5.13|Matt 5:13]], [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 87. 3</sup>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** as accusative (in Biblical Aramaic, as in Syriac, there being no verbal suffix of 3 plural; so Egyptian Aramaic [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>76 B 4</sup>, [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. E 5</sup> +), En 2:34 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎והדקת הִמּוֺ‎</span> and crushed ***them***, v35; 3:22; [[Ezra.4.10|Ezra 4:10]]; [[Ezra.4.23|Ezra 4:23]]; [[Ezra.5.5|Ezra 5:5]]; [[Ezra.5.12|Ezra 5:12]]; [[Ezra.5.14|Ezra 5:14]] (twice in verse); [[Ezra.5.15|Ezra 5:15]]; [[Ezra.7.17|Ezra 7:17]]. — compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִנּוּן‎</span>.
